General.Name: Youcare Pharmaceutical Group Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Youcare Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, distribution, and sale of pharmaceutical products. It offers drugs in various forms, such as injection, tablets, capsules, granules, etc. The company provides drugs in various categories, including antibiotics, gastrointestinal, external, hypoglycemic, antibacterial, antiviral agent, anti-hepatitis, anti- tumor, cardio-cerebral, and immunomodulation. Youcare Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
